1.content:
Let's start off with the easy part.

Are you male, female, or neither?
Pronouns that will be used are listed as well.

If you choose male or neither, this will automatically put you in the LGBT theme bracket, since your love interest is strictly male, and there will be no choice in changing him.


Note: Male MC will be worked on by publisher first, as the original work this was based on had a male MC.

Note for editors: Those who add onto to this part may only expand on these three choice with appearance, backstory, age and similar choices and must not or must not attempt to change the main story line.
1.title: Chapter 1: page 1

info.brief_description: A world on the brink of destruction,gods who care little for humans...and an unlikely love
info.description:
Synopsis: The world has been plummeted into world war; all the nations fight for a spot among the gods. Three nations have fallen, and two have been chose, now only one spot remains. Prosperity, power, and wealth is promised to the nations who rise above the rest. In the background of the chaos, a human lives through the torment of its nation's poverty, and separately, a god watches the world slowly tear itself down. The two meet unexpectedly, and the god begins to see the true effects of the war. The spot to reign is challenged by the human, and the world watched as the two sides are united.
M/F main character choices
Themes: tragedy, action, romance
Warnings: Gore, death, some lgbt themes

Your goal? Guide your nation to the final slot among the gods, abandon your world for your love, or become a lone ranger and just survive by any means. Its up to you.



For Other Editors:

Note: This story will first follow the path of the original version that was made without branching path; if you wish to see a certain choice be chosen, you may specially request that choice, or edit it in yourself.
: Any choices specially made by viewers that diverts/alters the main story line with be edited or removed entirely.
-You must not alter the love interest or add other permanent interests.
- You must not alter the personalities of any main character, or force them to do acts that would be labeled "ooc".
- You can not ad non-canonical properties to the universe, or insert unnecessary events that would lead to typically non-canonical properties.
- Do not insert any pictures into the spaces between words, sentences, or paragraphs. Header and ending photo covers are allowed, as long as the picture does not for the rating to increase.
- Keep to the lore of the land. This is loosely based on Greek Mythos, and very slight inclusion of Cthulhu Mythos; please try to stick to those mythologies. The main author will do so as well and will edit what does not follow, but will understand small errors. Please don't turn Cthulhu into a penguin and call it accurate lore.



That's it. Enjoy the story!
